Medium: Carved, painted and gilded walnut, pine, and linden; iron hardware; silk and wool Beauvais tapestry; modern silk damask
Dimensions: H. of canopy from floor 156-3/4 in. (398.1cm);
Gr. W. of headboard   73-1/2 in. (186.7 cm);
Gr. W. of tester  91-1/2 in. (232.4 cm)

Credit Line: Gift of Kingdon Gould, in memory of his mother, Edith Kingdon Gould, 1923
Provenance: William Alexander Louis Stephen Douglas-Hamilton, 12th Duke of Hamilton , Lanarkshire (until 1882
sale, Christie, Manson and Woods, London, July 18, 1882, no. 1912, to Radley)
